S3StorageConfiguration.description: A complex type that describes an S3 location where recorded videos will be stored.

BucketName.description: Location (S3 bucket name) where recorded videos will be stored. Note that the StorageConfiguration and S3 bucket must be in the same region as the Composition.
BucketName.markdownDescription:
Location (S3 bucket name) where recorded videos will be stored. Note that the StorageConfiguration and S3 bucket must be in the same region as the Composition.

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 63

Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: Storage Configuration ARN is automatically generated on creation and assigned as the unique identifier.
Arn.markdownDescription:
Storage Configuration ARN is automatically generated on creation and assigned as the unique identifier.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:aws[-a-z]*:ivs:[a-z0-9-]+:[0-9]+:storage-configuration/[a-zA-Z0-9-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption
